# 壬学正解

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/renxue-zhengjie
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/renxue-zhengjie
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install renxue-zhengjie
renxue-zhengjie <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g renxue-zhengjie
renxue-zhengjie <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
